title: Around the State
text: Oct 2 2015 6:09 pm Ã— Site: Shuford Stadium, Salisbury, N.C. Time: 1:30 p.m. Records: Newberry 3-1, 1-0 in South Atlantic Conference; Catawba 2-2, 1-1 in South Atlantic Conference Last meeting: Catawba won, 37-34, in 2OT North Greenville at Mars Hill Site: Meares Stadium, Mars Hill, N.C. Time: 1:30 p.m. Records: North Greenville 2-2, Mars Hill 1-3 Last meeting: Mars Hill won, 30-27 Limestone at Wingate Site: Belk Stadium, Wingate, N.C. Time: 1:30 p.m. Records: Limestone 1-2, Wingate 4-0 Last meeting: Wingate won, 38-10 Kentucky State at Benedict Site: Charlie Johnson Stadium, Columbia Time: 2 p.m. Records: Benedict 0-4, Kentucky State 1-3 Presbyterian at Western Carolina Site: Whitmire Stadium, Cullowhee, N.C. Time: 3:30 p.m. Records: Presbyterian 1-3, Western Carolina 1-2 Last meeting: Presbyterian won, 19-14 Alabama A&M at Coastal Carolina Site: Brooks Stadium, Conway Records: Coastal Carolina 4-0, Alabama A&M 1-2 Last meeting: First meeting Site: Five Star Stadium, Macon, Ga. Time: 6 p.m. Records: Wofford 2-2, Mercer 1-2 Last meeting: Wofford won, 34-6 S.C. State at Furman
